name: Bluescreen
description:
Instructions:

- You control a virus and your goal is to provoke the bluescreen failure in all pcs

- The golden pc makes you faster for the remaining of the phase

- Your enemies are:

  1) The firewall: protects one of the sides of the pc

  2) Antivirus: to infect a pc with antivirus you have to  infect 3 times

This game was made for the Wowie Jam 3.0

Controls: Mouse

Credits:

  • Sound Effects: Ultimate Sound FX Bundle
  • Music: HyperCasual Music Pack (Demo)
